full_text:
MCC New York will provide an update to the Court as soon as the autopsy is completed and the official cause of death is determined. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to call me at (646)836-7700. Thank you for your time and attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Lamine N'Diaye
Warden
MCC New York

cc: Michael Greco, U.S. Marshal, and (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Chief Deputy U.S. Marshal
Michael J. Fitzpatrick, Chief U.S. Probation Officer
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Assistant U.S. Attorneys
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Counsel for Mr. Epstein
